summary: This is my first Standalone Follower!
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][u][size=5][color=#ff0000][/color][/size][/u][/b][/center][b][u][size=5][color=#ff0000][center]ALERTS[/center]
[/color][/size][/u][/b][center][color=#ff0000]If you decide to download this follower mod please can you leave feedback on this including whether the mod actually works or if there are any bugs. Thanks!

I would Greatly Appreciate it if Anyone submits some screenshots because I'm Not to Good at Taking Them :D[/color][/center]
[color=#0000ff]
[/color][center][color=#0000ff][b][size=5][u][font=Comic Sans MS]Description[/font]
[/u][/size][/b][/color][b]Name: [/b][size=4]Bethan[/size]
[b]Body Type:[/b][size=4] UNP Blessed Body or CBBE[/size]
[b]Gender:[/b][size=4] Female[/size]
[b]Race:[/b][size=4] Imperial[/size]
[b]Voice type:[/b][size=4] Vanilla 'YoungEager'[/size]
[b]Marriageable:[/b][size=4] Yes[/size]
[b]Weight:[/b][size=4] 80[/size]
[b]Location:[/b][size=4] Whiterun - The Bannered Mare[/size]
[b]Combat style:[/b][size=4] Melee[/size][/center]
[size=4]Bethan's starting outfit is the 'Light Imperial Armour'[/size][size=3] (Long live the Emperor! Long Live The Empire!) and she also has an 'Elven Sword' to use in combat, she knows one spell - Healing.

[/size]Tbh when I say Half Elf, all I mean is the ears are Elf like (Adjusted in racemenu)

[font=Comic Sans MS][center][color=#0000ff][size=5][u]Requirements[/u]
[/size][/color][b][size=4]None other than Skyrim Being up-to-date[/size][/b][/center][b]

[/b]
[/font][center][size=5][b][u][font=Comic Sans MS]Installation[/font]
[/u][/b][/size][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]Drag files into the Skyrim Data Folder or use Mod Manager/Organiser[/size][size=4] [/size]

[u][size=5]Credits
[/size][/u]Firstly I'd Like to give a massive thank you to Skyla - I used her Tutorial to make a Standalone follower [/b][/font][/center][font=Comic Sans MS][b]
                    [center][/center]                         [youtube]xcHw4sqrrx8[/youtube][color=#0000ff][u][size=5][center]Mods[/center][/size][/u][/color][center][color=#0000ff][u][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?]UNP Blessed Body[/url][/size][/u][/color]
[u][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/]KS Hairdos[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url][/size][/u][/center][center][u][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/][/url]
[/size][/u][/center]
[/b][/font][size=3] [/size]
author: BBK
